hcc_text: Paul Avenue is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
info: At Paul Avenue at West Mosholu Parkway South and Mosholu Parkway, there were 20 injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Paul Avenue at West Mosholu Parkway South and Mosholu Parkway
